description: In my current role, I lead and oversee the migration of fiber optic circuits (primarily Gigabit Ethernet and WDM) as part of Telefónica's project to dismantle technical rooms across Spain. My main responsibility is to coordinate multidisciplinary teams (technical study, withdrawal design, work order creation, and field execution) and synchronize night jobs with outside plant and inside field technicians, as well as traffic supervisors. Although my position does not explicitly require Data Science skills, I have actively applied my knowledge in this area to develop tools that optimize processes and increase efficiency.

key_achievements.title: Team coordination and telecommunications circuit migration
key_achievements.context: Contribution to Telefónica España's infrastructure modernization strategy by eliminating redundant technical facilities
key_achievements.action: Coordination of multidisciplinary teams (circuit classification, withdrawal design, external and internal plant field execution, service status monitoring) to migrate telecommunications circuits
key_achievements.result: Successful relocation of circuits in 5 main technical centers with an 85% success rate

key_achievements.title: Development of data visualization dashboards
key_achievements.action: Implemented dashboards with Python and R to generate automated reports
key_achievements.result: 30% reduction in report generation time and improved project visibility

key_achievements.title: Automation of reporting systems and workflows
key_achievements.action: Created scripts integrating Excel data and sending automatic notifications
key_achievements.result: 20% time savings in manual tasks and increased productivity

key_achievements.title: Use of Language Models (LLMs) to analyze complex data and automate tasks
key_achievements.context: Interpretation of inventories and diverse documentation
key_achievements.action: Trained and integrated LLMs to extract and classify unstructured information
key_achievements.result: 25% reduction in decision-making time and minimized errors

experience.description: Consolidate deployment, operations, and financial data to produce weekly reports on fiber optic infrastructure (Backhaul). Manage information flows between teams without hierarchical dependency, ensuring coherence and transparency in operational, maintenance, and financial indicators. Present findings in Excel and PowerPoint, providing management with the necessary information for decision-making.

key_achievements.title: Strengthening analytical thinking and data storytelling in report preparation
key_achievements.context: Role focused on information management and communication with high-level stakeholders
key_achievements.action: Design and apply data analysis methods along with visual narratives in Excel and PowerPoint, transforming complex information into clear and engaging reports
key_achievements.result: Better understanding of indicators by management and faster decision-making due to report clarity

experience.description: Coordinate the operation and maintenance of Orange's FTTH network, managing three teams (technical incidents, field technicians, and inventory administration) nationwide. Ensure smooth communication between all parties, compliance with SLAs/KPIs, and proactive resolution of operational issues, reporting daily on network status and incidents to the client.

key_achievements.title: Establishment of weekly meetings and KPI visualization
key_achievements.context: Coordination with the client for FTTH network operation and maintenance
key_achievements.action: Introduce daily reviews with the client, presenting key metrics (incidents, response times, coverage) and identifying risks
key_achievements.result: Greater transparency in service status and more effective joint decisions

key_achievements.title: Optimization of coordination with subcontractor teams
key_achievements.context: Supervision of various external teams responsible for network operation and maintenance
key_achievements.action: Implement continuous task tracking and communication to correct physical and logical inventories in a timely manner
key_achievements.result: Reduced delays in task execution and improved network information coherence

key_achievements.title: Identification and escalation of recurring incident patterns
key_achievements.context: Operation of nationwide FTTH network with demanding SLAs and high incident volume
key_achievements.action: Analyze historical data to detect patterns and coordinate preventive actions with teams
key_achievements.result: Significant reduction in resolution times and higher SLA compliance

key_achievements.title: Standardization of performance reports
key_achievements.context: Consolidation of operational and financial data sources for network and maintenance management
key_achievements.action: Design unified templates and reporting processes for incident volumes, response times, and deployment
key_achievements.result: Coherent and reliable information for decision-making, reducing manual efforts and duplication

experience.description: Responsible for managing the maintenance of JAZZTEL's external fiber optic plant network and data center infrastructure (power and cooling), with a preventive approach to minimize failures.

key_achievements.title: Reduction in network infrastructure failures
key_achievements.context: Maintenance of external plant and data centers to ensure service continuity
key_achievements.action: Analyze incident data and define preventive routines for power and cooling equipment
key_achievements.result: 25% decrease in failure rates and greater network stability

key_achievements.title: Implementation of preventive maintenance routines
key_achievements.context: Proactive infrastructure management to reduce breakdown risks
key_achievements.action: Design protocols and review intervals based on historical incident analysis
key_achievements.result: Fewer critical incidents and optimization of maintenance resources

experience.role: Outside Plant Fiber Optic Maintenance Manager
experience.description: Analyze symptom data to diagnose failures, coordinate resources, and assist field personnel, restoring service as quickly as possible.

key_achievements.title: Improvement in service recovery times
key_achievements.context: Incident management in external fiber optic network
key_achievements.action: Centralize and prioritize alerts based on criticality, assigning field resources agilely
key_achievements.result: 40% reduction in recovery time and higher customer satisfaction

key_achievements.title: Development of failure diagnosis protocols
key_achievements.context: Maintenance processes to identify and isolate technical issues
key_achievements.action: Design diagnostic guides and train personnel in early incident detection
key_achievements.result: Reduction in diagnostic errors and faster problem resolution

education: Master's in Big Data and Business Analytics - Complutense University of Madrid (2020 – 2021)
